tool_description: Live News on the Russia-Ukraine conflict from all over the world
name: Russia-Ukraine News Live
title: Russia-Ukraine News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source
api_list.description: Get Live News from a specific news source

api_list.name: Query All News
api_list.description: Get News on the Ukraine-Russia conflict from all around the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://russia-ukraine-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russia-ukraine-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://russia-ukraine-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russia-ukraine-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
